pages.text: The Morphora is a flower that turns blocks in a 9x9 area underneath the flower into other blocks. See the available morphs in the next page.$(br2)It requires activation by right-clicking it with a $(l:hexalia:items/hex_focus)Hex Focus$().

pages.title: Morphs
pages.text: Magma Block > Lava$(br)Snow Block > Packed Ice$(br)Soul Sand > Soul Soil$(br)Dirt > Podzol$(br)Sand > Red Sand$(br)Diorite > Granite$(br)Granite > Andesite$(br)Andesite > Diorite$(br)Ice > Blue Ice$(br)Blackstone > Calcite
